title: Sketchbook Folio, "Lake with Figure in Boat and Distant Mountains", 1885–1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
dimensions:
8.3 x 13.4 cm (3 1/4 x 5 1/4 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.5 x 19 cm (4 15/16 x 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Lake in foreground with small rowboat on water at left center. A figure sits inside the rowboat. Far shore rises into a tree-covered mountain at right, with distant mountains at left in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Lake with Figure in Boat and Distant Mountains", 1885–1902.
1885–1902. Graphite on cream wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-37.
